Store: Douglas Barr  (Actor),     Royal Dano  (Actor),     Patrick Read Johnson  (Director, Writer)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Science Fiction & Fantasy, Science Fiction, Aliens
Product Description: ["They're hip! They're hilarious! Earth will never be the same! It's a close encounter of the hilarious kind when five of the universe's coolest aliens crash-land on planet Earth! Piloted by an ultrahip Martian, the cosmic crew ends up in a sleepy Midwestern town. Unfortunately, it's Halloween night and the citizens mistake these spaced invaders for harmless trick-or-treaters. Instead of the global invasion they planned on, these misguided Martians bungle their way into a series of madcap misadventures! Get set for an outrageous blast of intergalactic fun and outlandish special effects in this wacked-out comedy-adventure!"]
Average Rating: 4.7

reference_summary:
Yo Gabba Gabba: There's a Party in My City! Live Concert
Biz Markie  (Actor),     Yo Gabba Gabba  (Director)    Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Kids & Family
["Join D.J. Lance Rock, Brobee, Toodee, Foofa, Plex, Muno and all of our favorite Yo Gabba Gabba! friends for their first-ever live concert! Yo Gabba Gabba! Live!: There's a Party in My City! is a non-stop musical extravaganza. Get up on your feet to sing and dance along over ten Gabba favorites, including: There's a Party in My Tummy, Name Game and Get The Sillies Out. This full-length concert is packed with special guests including beatboxing legend Biz Markie performing Biz's Beat of the Day, the incomparable Leslie Hall & DO IT teaching a Dancey Dance, and Super Music Friends Show guest The Aquabats performing everyone's favorite, Pool Party. Yo Gabba Gabba! Live!: There's a Party in My City! will get the whole family dancing and singing no matter what city you're in!"]

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Target Audience**: Primarily focused on children's content, with an aim to engage younger family members, highlighting a strong family-oriented approach.
- **Content Type**: Prefers interactive, musical, and performance-based entertainment that encourages activity, such as singing and dancing, while also enjoying comedic and adventurous themes.
- **Emotional Engagement**: Values experiences that foster joyful moments and connections, as shown by the excitement of the grandson and the user's pride in being a special grandparent.
- **Rating Preference**: Exhibits a tendency to favor high-quality content, reflected in a mix of 4 and 5-star ratings given to various products, demonstrating a consistent inclination toward well-received children's programming and family-friendly films.
- **Purchase Motivation**: Driven by a desire to provide entertainment that encourages enjoyment, connection, and laughter within the family context, now also including comedic and sci-fi elements that appeal to a broader audience.
- **Product Format**: Comfortable with DVD format, indicating a preference for physical media which enhances accessibility for children and family viewing.

Overall, this user remains committed to nurturing family relationships through engaging and entertaining children's and family-oriented films and experiences, while also appreciating humor and lighthearted adventures.
